getTBinR
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Introduction to getTBinR

Get the WHO TB Burden Data

Get the TB burden data from the WHO, see here for details.

get_tb_burden(url = "https://extranet.who.int/tme/generateCSV.asp?ds=estimates",
  path = "data-raw", save = TRUE, save_name = "TB_burden",
  return = TRUE)

Arguments

url

Character string, indicating the url of the TB burden data. Default is current url.
path

Character string, indicating the folder to save the data into, defaults to data-raw.
save

Logical, should the data be saved for reuse. Defaults to TRUE.
save_name

Character string, name to save the data under. Defaults to TB_burden.
return

Logical, should the data be returned as a dataframe. Defaults to TRUE.

Value

The WHO TB burden data as a tibble.

See also

search_data_dict

Examples


tb_burden <- get_tb_burden()

head(tb_burden)
